r.d: This extension allows you to use the versatile JSONPath query language to extract the properties that you want from a decoded JSON document.
r.n: * Drop support for PHP 7.4 by @crocodele in https://github.com/supermetrics-public/pecl-jsonpath/pull/172 * Test with PHP 8.3 on Windows, unify naming and formatting in workflow files by @crocodele in https://github.com/supermetrics-public/pecl-jsonpath/pull/173
